text: Arne Morten Granlien (born 6 April 1955) is a Norwegian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1980 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Norway Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1980 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lillehammer
title: Arne Morten Granlien
